page.title: 07LOCAL DOCTOR'S PRACTICE,WYKE
page.content: Our local G.P. was twenty-six when he began his career as a doctor. The worst cases which he has to deal with are road accidents. Much of his daily work is concerned with minor complaints such as colds, aches and pains. Ante-natal care is an important part of his job, and in this he co-operates closely with the local hospitals and midwives. At 8.30am. his surgery starts. The surgery closes at 1pm. and re-opens at 2pm. for ante-natal and baby clinics.The doctor makes house calls on patients too elderly or ill to visit the surgery. He also delivers blood samples to the hospital at the end of his day. Our doctor operates as a member of a team of doctors who share the workload within the practice.
